name: rehospitalization
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of taking someone back to stay in hospital again after they have been treated there and have left: Patients are at the highest risk for rehospitalization in the first two months after being discharged. Blood clots are a common cause of re-hospitalisation after this operation. The rate of death during rehospitalizations was significantly higher than in the original hospitalization. Related word
rehospitalize
More examplesFewer examplesRehospitalization rates for patients with heart failure are as high as 30 percent.She followed her doctor's advice because she was afraid of rehospitalization.The new drug made little difference to the rate of death or rehospitalization.
